title: "weather font"?
content:
hello   
i'm looking for pictograms or font aboout weather : sun, clouds, storm...   
   
thanks to help me, and excuse my bad english !
author: weeliam

comments.content: Wee, did you try a Google search?

yes, but there's nothing "glamorous"...   
Only ugly web's pictos...   
   
I'm looking to easy picto, as an "industrial font", or "FFTransit"..   
Something really round and easy.   
The same logotypes that you can find on a camera ( to select white balance, sunny, cloudy...)   
Do you know what i mean??

Here are two though MyFonts: [marina](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018222136/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/pixymbols/marina/) and [ozdoby](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018222136/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/storm/ozdoby/)
Here is another one if you're still looking: [Almanac Pi](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018222136/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/almanac-pi/)
